name: Tembaga Policy Generator - BS7799
short_description: BS7799/ISO17799 Policy Generator Toolkit. A toolkit to generate security policies based on questions and answers. Toolkit based on BS 7799 or ISO 17799, Information Security Management System, ISMS.
